books.author: by John Boehner
books.description: The former speaker of the House reflects on his time in Washington, key political figures and the current state of the Republican Party.
books.name: ON THE HOUSE

books.author: by Patrick Radden Keefe
books.description: A portrait of the Sackler family, known for their philanthropy toward institutions around the world, and their involvement with Valium and OxyContin.
books.name: EMPIRE OF PAIN

books.author: by Walter Isaacson
books.description: How the Nobel Prize winner Jennifer Doudna and her colleagues invented CRISPR, a tool that can edit DNA.
books.name: THE CODE BREAKER

books.author: by Brandi Carlile
books.description: The six-time Grammy Award-winning singer and songwriter recounts difficulties during her formative years and her hard-won successes.
books.name: BROKEN HORSES

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Matthew McConaughey
books.description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over the last 35 years.
books.name: GREENLIGHTS

books.author: by Isabel Wilkerson
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist examines aspects of caste systems across civilizations and reveals a rigid hierarchy in America today.
books.name: CASTE

books.author: by Jenny Lawson
books.description: The humorist maps out her mental and physical health journey.
books.name: BROKEN

books.author: by Glennon Doyle
books.description: The activist and public speaker describes her journey of listening to her inner voice.
books.name: UNTAMED

books.author: by Hunter Biden
books.description: The lawyer and artist, who is the son of the current president, details tragedies within his family and his path to sobriety.
books.name: BEAUTIFUL THINGS

books.author: by Erin French
books.description: A memoir by the chef and owner of the Lost Kitchen in Freedom, Maine.
books.name: FINDING FREEDOM

books.author: by Adam Grant
books.description: An examination of the cognitive skills of rethinking and unlearning that could be used to adapt to a rapidly changing world.
books.name: THINK AGAIN

books.author: by Michio Kaku
books.description: The theoretical physicist explains the controversy around the synthesis of the theory of relativity and quantum theory.
books.name: THE GOD EQUATION

books.author: by Michelle Obama
books.description: The former first lady describes her journey from the South Side of Chicago to the White House, and how she balanced work, family and her husband’s political ascent.
books.name: BECOMING

books.author: by Bill Bryson
books.description: An owner’s manual of the human body covering various parts, functions and what happens when things go wrong.
books.name: THE BODY
